txt.en:
'Valandur was one of the kings who ruled over Annúminas during its glory years. He was a wise and just man, and he was known to his people by his sceptre.

'As he judged a case or complaint, he would carefully ponder the words that were being said. To maintain order, only those holding his sceptre were allowed to speak. When he had made a decision, the sceptre would shine with a white light.

'We had thought this sceptre lost to history, but recently I have seen a kergrim stalking around Haudh Valandur holding it. I believe he makes his nest within the tomb. We must have Valandur's sceptre returned to us!'
'This sceptre is amazing! It is difficult to believe that after all these years it is still intact.'
'We must have this sceptre returned to us.'
Valandur, a king of Annúminas, was known for his sceptre.
Collect the sceptre from the kergrim within Haudh Valandur
Haudh Valandur is to the west of the Ranger-camp within the Way of Kings.\n\nMaladan asked you to venture within the tomb of Haudh Valandur and return a sceptre held by a kergrim within.
Bring the sceptre to Maladan in the Way of Kings
Maladan is at the Ranger-camp in the Way of Kings.\n\nMaladan will be eager to receive Valandur's sceptre.
